external_references.description: FireEye. (2020, December 13). Highly Evasive Attacker Leverages SolarWinds Supply Chain to Compromise Multiple Global Victims With SUNBURST Backdoor. Retrieved January 4, 2021.

objects.description: During the [SolarWinds Compromise](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0024), [APT29](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0016) was able to get [SUNBURST](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0559) signed by SolarWinds code signing certificates by injecting the malware into the SolarWinds Orion software lifecycle.(Citation: FireEye SUNBURST Backdoor December 2020)
